StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetShipperSpecialRecogni.on]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @ShipperID int ) AS
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT [ID], [ShipperID], [HighPFT], [HighShooter], [MeritPromo.on], [PlatoonHonorGrad], [SeriesHonorGrad], [CompanyHonorGrad] FROM [USMC].[Shipper_SpecialRecogni.on] WHERE [ShipperID] = @ShipperID
